channel.title: masters on the dubious monk
channel.description: Recent content in masters on the dubious monk

item.title: western cyclocross challenge 2024
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Canmore Nordic Centre Canmore Course: stravalink Western Challenge CX. This race is done in age groups to get points for call-ups for Nationals and what have you so it isn’t part of the Alberta Cup CX race series. results ABA Results CrossResults Podia Elite/Open Women Christiane BILODEAU1 Quinn GERMAINE Ashton THOMSON Elite/Open Men Finn BORSTMAYER Rhett BATES Mark FAGNAN Junior Women Lydia STACK-MICHASIW Maria MCCARTNEY Dakota DIXON Just a note that last year’s Junior Women winner of this race, Nico Knoll is now racing CX in the USCX series.

item.title: puncheur cross 2023
item.description: Tech Guide Location: Voyageur Park Devon Course: stravalink This was Provincials for this year, which seems early. I wasn’t at this race, but Nancy St-Hilaire has good pictures on her SmugMug. results Official Results CrossResults Podia Open Women Jenaya FRANCIS Nico KNOLL Christiane BILODEAU Open Men Eric BERG Ryan MACLEAN 1 Andrew DAVIDSON Junior Women Dakota DIXON U17 Women Madeline MAGLEO Lily GORDON U15 Women Hazel ROBERTS Sarah WELSH Eliza MCRAE Junior Men Graham FRANCIS Colton ZABOLOTNEY Ben MORIN U17 Men Larix HALLET Quinten MACKLEM Liam BATE U15 Men William KINDZIERSKI Finlay ROBERTS Riley OOSTERHOF Master Women 35-44 Bridget LINDER Jenn PROCHE Kristin BAKER Master Women 45+ Jay SMITH Michelle JACKMAN Daena SIDNEY Master Men 35-44 Graham DIEHL Blaine SHERMAN Adam ROBERTS Master Men 45-54 Paul MARTIN Randy PERRY David ROBERTS Master Men 55-64 Ed GARVIN Robert MARTENS Peter LAWRENCE Master Men 65+ Ken GERMAINE Gregory PATYCHUK Louis BUGEAUD Sport Women Alina CUSTODIO Leanne ERIKSON Alyssa BARKER Novice Men Emmett MACKLEM Jett FENTON Arun WARD my results Did not race read more My 2022 Experience at Puncheur Cross Only a 14 second gap between first and second for Provincial champion.
